arts.ttl: Flick slams 'wrong' VAR decision in Barça loss
arts.sum: Barcelona coach Hansi Flick criticised the "wrong decision" to disallow Robert Lewandowski's goal for offside as his team were beaten 1-0 at Real Sociedad on Sunday in LaLiga.

arts.ttl: Real Sociedad puts the brakes on Barcelona
arts.sum: Winter is coming' for a Barça that was beaten 0-1 at the Reale Arena by a more intense Real that took advantage of Take Kubo's great game. Before the first minute Casadó prevented the 1-0 by taking away a clear goal ball from Sucic when the Croatian was about to finish from close range a pass from Kubo.

arts.ttl: Barcelona's Hansi Flick provides Lamine Yamal injury update and confirms Spain request
arts.sum: Barcelona manager Hansi Flick delivers an update on the fitness of Lamine Yamal after the 17-year-old missed Sunday's 1-0 La Liga loss to Real Sociedad.

arts.ttl: 2 Barcelona stars depart dressing room limping after Real Sociedad defeat
arts.sum: Two leading members of the first-team setup at La Liga leaders Barcelona were spotted limping, on the back of the club’s meeting with Real Sociedad. This of course comes fresh…

arts.ttl: Barcelona hit one unwanted mark for the first time in 10 years vs Real Sociedad
arts.sum: A head-turning statistic, highlighting the woes of Barcelona during the club’s meeting with Real Sociedad, has tonight come to the fore online. This, of course, comes fresh off an outing…

arts.ttl: Too dependent on Lamine Yamal? Concerning stat surfaces after Barcelona’s defeat to Sociedad

arts.ttl: Real Sociedad 1-0 Barcelona: Highlights, man of the match, stats as La Liga leaders suffer surprise defeat
arts.sum: Sheraldo Becker scores the only goal of the match as Real Sociedad record a 1-0 victory over La Liga leaders Barcelona in Sunday's clash at Anoeta Stadium.

arts.ttl: Real Sociedad 1-0 Barcelona: Player ratings as Spanish leaders crumble against La Real
arts.sum: Player ratings & match report from Barcelona's 1-0 loss to Real Sociedad.

arts.ttl: Barcelona star suffers injury during Real Sociedad clash
arts.sum: Barcelona have this evening been dealt a fresh blow on the personnel front. This comes after midfielder Frenkie de Jong was forced into a premature departure from the club’s latest…

arts.ttl: Why Barcelona star is being whistled by Real Sociedad fans
arts.sum: Barcelona star Iñigo Martínez has been singled out for a rough reception on the part of the home fans during the club’s meeting with Real Sociedad on Sunday. Why, though,…
